title: Ride cancellations in India
selftext:
Form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdJMcM_20HAhk5LRkdnwG_kW_3MVF6q9ewQMLV7OV8jloJd-A/viewform

I am working on a project to find possible solutions to reduce ride cancellations on ride hailing apps. This survey is to understand reasons for ride cancellation. Please spare your valuable 2 minutes to fill this form.
Thanks!!
